definition: A term commonly employed to describe the natural phenomenon that occurs daily, typically in the early morning, when the sun becomes visible above the horizon. It is often used to refer to the breathtaking moment when the first rays of sunlight illuminate the sky, marking the beginning of a new day.

examples.german: Wir haben den Sonnenaufgang am Strand beobachtet.
examples.english: We watched the sunrise at the beach.

examples.german: Der Sonnenaufgang markiert den Beginn eines neuen Tages.
examples.english: The sunrise marks the beginning of a new day.

examples.german: Der Sonnenaufgang tauchte den Himmel in leuchtende Farben.
examples.english: The sunrise bathed the sky in vibrant colors.
Early risers often enjoy the sunrise.
